attributes.action: rescind his formal invitation for the pope to visit England in 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that the majority of the UK population have no religion the Govermnent should not expect the taxpayer to pay for proposed visit by the pope. I believe in the freedom of speech and don't believe the visit should be banned on the basis of the views he holds. However, if he wishes to speak to the British people he should do so at his own expense.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
